comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I think this is not a Sopwith Scout, but a Sopwith Tabloid: www.rafmuseum.org.uk/london/collections/aircraft/sopwith-... The Scout, aka Pup: www.rafmuseum.org.uk/london/collections/aircraft/sopwith-...

comment._content: Serial no. 326 Identified on this site as Tabloid: www.ukserials.com/serials-older-000.htm

comment._content: Thanks artolog, it does appear to be a Tabloid not a Scout. We'll update our records.
